title: Bug 4329: No results when searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: Bug 4329: When searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X), no results are returned.
OB: Searching via context menu in packages view works.
EB: When searching for declarations via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X), no results are returned. However, searching via the context menu in the packages view is successful.
SR: The search functionality should first attempt to retrieve the Java element and, if unsuccessful, display the element name instead of the fully qualified name. Notes: [Include any additional notes or recommendations here if applicable.]
